alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 8:29PM CDT until May 29 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Hidalgo County in Deep South Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hidalgo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hidalgo, Valley View Junior High School, Hidalgo Public Library, Hidalgo High School, Valley View Elementary School, Mcallen, Hidalgo International Bridge, Doctor Alejo Salinas Junior Elementary School, Lake Texano and Carlson Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
